name: Random.Salsa20

unions.name: State
unions.comment: The internal state of the generator. Contains the key, nonce and a counter.

values.name: init
values.comment: Initialize the generator. This stores the key and nonce inside the state, and sets the counter to 0.

values.name: peel
values.comment: Gets an `Int` out of the current state. The result will be an unsigned 32 bit integer.

name: Salsa20

aliases.name: Nonce
aliases.comment: Nonce. A random unique code that should be unique for each message.

values.name: salsa20
values.comment:
Encrypt/decrypt data using the Salsa20 function.

This function is symmetric, so it can be used for both encryption and decryption.

values.name: toKey
values.comment: Build a key out of bytes. The key must be either 16 or 32 bytes long.

values.name: toNonce
values.comment: Build a nonce out of bytes. The nonce must be either 8 bytes long.
